tit.cmt: 左記のように変更しました。

sen.j: 特記事項
sen.e: Special notice
Special notice
Remarks

sen.j: 井手町（いでちょう）は、京都府南部に位置する町。
sen.e: Ide Town is a town located in the south of Kyoto Prefecture.
Ide Town is a town located in the south of Kyoto Prefecture.
Ide-cho is a town located in the south of Kyoto Prefecture.
The town has an area of 18.01 square kilometers.
The town has an area of 18.01 square kilometers.
The town has an area of 18.01 square kilometers.

sen.j: 木津川 (京都府)の支流である玉川 (井手町)が町を東西に縦断している。
sen.e: Tama-gawa River, a tributary of the Kizu-gawa River, flows east-west through the town.
Tama-gawa River, a tributary of the Kizu-gawa River, flows east-west through the town.
Tama-gawa River (Ide-cho), a tributary of the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), flows east-west through the town.
sen.cmt: 京都府、井手町 を追加しました。

sen.j: 春になると花見をする人たちで賑わう。
sen.e: The town is full of people for cherry blossom viewing in spring.
The town is full of people viewing cherry blossoms in spring.
The town is full of people viewing cherry blossoms in spring.

sen.j: 町内の地域としては、多賀、井手、有王区域となる。
sen.e: Ide Town has the three sections of Taga, Ide and Ario.
Ide Town is divided into three sections: Taga, Ide and Ario.
Ide-cho is divided into three sections: Taga, Ide and Ario.

sen.j: 1958年（昭和33年）4月1日 （旧）井手町と多賀村が合併して井手町となる。
sen.e: On April 1, 1958, Ide Town and Taga Village were merged to form Ide Town.
On April 1, 1958, Ide Town and Taga Village were merged to form Ide Town.
April 1, 1958: Old Ide-cho and Taga-mura were merged to form Ide-cho.
sen.cmt: 他と統一して、ide-cho, taga-mura としました。"On April 1, 1958, old"→"April 1, 1958: Old"に変更しました。

sen.j: 現在、他市、他町との合併などが協議中である。
sen.e: Merger with other cities and towns is currently under discussion.
Merger with other cities and towns is currently under discussion.
Merger with other cities and towns is currently under discussion.

sen.j: 町長：汐見明男
sen.e: Mayor: Akio SHIOMI
Mayor: Akio SHIOMI
Mayor: Akio SHIOMI

sen.j: 1995年(平成7年)8月27日～ 3選目
sen.e: As of August 27, 1995, (third term)
As of August 27, 1995, (third term)
Since August 27, 1995 (third term)
sen.cmt: 不要なカンマを削除しました。Since としました。

sen.j: 教育
sen.e: Education
Education
Education

sen.j: 城陽市、京田辺市、木津川市、宇治田原町、和束町、精華町
sen.e: Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Kizugawa City, Ujitawara Town, Wazuka Town and Seika Town
Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Kizugawa City, Ujitawara Town, Wazuka Town and Seika Town
Joyo City, Kyotanabe City, Kizugawa City, Ujitawara-cho, Wazuka-cho and Seika-cho
sen.cmt: 他と統一して、-cho としました。

sen.j: 他府県とは隣接していない。
sen.e: Ide Town does not have any adjacent prefectures.
Ide Town does not have any adjacent prefectures.
Ide-cho does not have any adjacent prefectures.

sen.j: 奈良線（線路名称としては京都駅～木津駅 (京都府)間がJR奈良線である。）
sen.e: Nara Line (the railroad line between Kyoto Station and Kizu Station is JR Nara Line.)
Nara Line (the railroad line between Kyoto Station and Kizu Station is JR Nara Line.)
The Nara Line (the railroad line between Kyoto Station and Kizu Station (Kyoto Prefecture) is called the JR Nara Line.)
sen.cmt: 京都府 追加しました。"Nara Line"→"The Nara Line"に変更しました。"R Nara Line"→"the JR Nara Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: （京都・宇治駅 (JR西日本)方面～）山城多賀駅、玉水駅（～木津・奈良駅方面）
sen.e: Yamashirotaga Station (from/to Kyoto and Uji Stations), Tamamizu Station (from/to Kizu and Nara Stations)
Yamashirotaga Station (from/to Kyoto and Uji Stations), Tamamizu Station (from/to Kizu and Nara Stations)
(from/to Kyoto and Uji Stations) - Yamashirotaga Station - Tamamizu Station - (from/to Kizu and Nara Stations)

sen.j: 中心となる駅はJR奈良線の玉水駅で2003年3月15日のダイヤ改正により快速停車駅となる。
sen.e: The main station is Tamamizu Station on the JR Nara Line, and rapid trains will stop at the station after the schedule change on March 15, 2003.
The main station is Tamamizu Station on the JR Nara Line, and rapid trains will stop at the station after the schedule change on March 15, 2003.
The main station is Tamamizu Station on the JR Nara Line, and rapid trains started to stop at the station after the timetable revision on March 15, 2003.

tit.j: 名所・旧跡・観光スポット・祭事・催事
tit.e: Scenic sites, historic sites, tourist spots, festivals and events
Scenic sites, historic sites, tourist spots, festivals and events
Scenic sites, historic sites, tourist spots, festivals and events

sen.j: 橘諸兄の旧跡、井手寺跡、六角井戸、蛙塚、小野小町塚がある。
sen.e: There are historic sites related to TACHIBANA no Moroe: Ide-ji Temple Site, Rokkaku-ido Well, Kawazu-zuka Mound, and ONO no Komachi-tuka Mound.
There are historic sites related to TACHIBANA no Moroe: Ide-ji Temple Site, Rokkaku-ido Well, Kawazu-zuka Mound, and ONO no Komachi-tuka Mound.
There are historic sites of TACHIBANA no Moroe, Ide-ji Temple Site, Rokkaku-ido Well, Kawazu-zuka Mound, and ONO no Komachi-zuka Mound.
sen.cmt: : からカンマに変更しました。 Komachi-zuka としました。
